item.title: JDK probs
item.dc:creator: @magnum magnum
item.description:
@magnum wrote:

You dont put it as CLASSPATH just try to do Path in the top box and see if it works

Path H:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin

Thats how mine was set up no i use ant so it dont matter

And second what source you using easyrsc v1.1 if so just go into the mudclient in the client folder then alt f “rsc” and then edit all of them to the name you want

Read full topic

item.title: JDK probs
item.dc:creator: @Deathman17 Deathman17
item.description:
@Deathman17 wrote:

not sure if it matters but in mine i dont have the “\bin” and it works fine also i know on mine sometimes java doesnt close out which makes it where i cant compile…just go to task manager and end process on java…could be many diff ways it says it but everything that has the word java i always end process on it and then i can compile…if that doesnt work then i dont know…also everything you need to change the client name and stuff is located in the mudclient file

item.title: JDK probs
item.dc:creator: @geeno geeno
item.description:
@geeno wrote:

Please help im very frusterate I downloaded then installed my JDK. did the whole envirmoental setting crap this is what i put for CLASSSPATH…
CLASSPATH=H:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
This is what i put for PATH…
H:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

I can run my server but no compile it! Please help me! Also i dont need a coder i would rather learn on my own ;D but just a quick tut maybe on how to rename a server!?! like open such file do ctrl +f such and such replace idk? please though my main problem is JDk getting darn compiler to work but if you want id like help with renaming too!

Thanks for your time and help!

Read full topic
